(Uhhh...Hugar, I forgot your characters names that are in the NeoCons 
so you'll have to remind me)

Shockwave/Unitron/Firestarter/Sixshot/Ares/Double Punch/Manterror/
Injector:




The huge purple form of the one-eyed Emperor loomed over the three 
former Predacons that now served the Neo Decepticon cause, for now.  
Among them were also Unitron, former Newcomer and Unicron look 
alike.  Firestarter, a Decepticon millions of years old.  Sixshot of 
the Third Cybertronian War, a STAG, Solo Transformer Attack Group, a 
six-changer.  Quite powerful and useful.  Ares, an average warrior 
but also a triple changer.  And then the three Predacons, somewhat 
outdated warriors that were best used for gun fodder and menial tasks.

"Fellow Neo Decepticons it was earlier in this planet's rotation that 
the Ramora's sensors detected a widely broadcasted transmission from 
the Alliance's island base.  After taking the time to decipher it I 
have learned the  Alliance member Nemesis Enforcer has evidently 
taken control of the Alliance at least temporarily."

The somewhat monotone voice of the one-eyed Decepticon stopped for a 
moment and began again.  "I wish to know all there is about Nemesis 
Enforcer," he said, raising his left hand which was actually a barrel 
of a laser weapon into the air, "begin now."

The three Predacons stepped forward, Double Punch obviously in charge 
of them.  "Basically, he's an insane dolt with half a laser core.  
Zardus was smart, Nemesis is dumb."

"Yeah," Manterror spoke up, "he like talks to himself and stuff.  
He'll be running the Alliance into the ground in no time I'd bet."

Shockwave watched the rest of the Neo Decepticons nodding in 
agreement, well those that were actually responding anyway, and 
raised his right hand which /is/ a hand.  "Silence.  Comments like 
those are important but to create a strategy based on them would be 
illogical.  The Alliance remained somewhat immobile except for aiding 
their Maximal allies.  What is the probability that this new Alliance 
leader will stay with those tactics?" he asked, noticing that no one 
had a real answer.

"If he's a loose cannon, chances are he'll attack." Unitron spoke up, 
emerald optic sensors seeming to be in deep thought.

"Very well," Shockwave began, "I want Manterror, Injector, and Ares 
to begin surveillance on the Alliance bases.  Unitron and Sixshot 
will begin surveillance on the Maximals.  Double Punch will remain 
here to assist me in surveying this planet to gain information on the 
current status of all the other factions here." the being ordered, 
all of them leaving except for Double Punch who took a place at one 
of the scanners.
